msg.msgText:
An "LTPAProfile" composite object can be updated by using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update LTPAProfile help imaserver update LTPAProfile "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update LTPAProfile "Name=LtpaProfile" "KeyFileName=LtpaKey" "Password=password"
Configuration items for "LTPAProfile" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
